response.answer_text: There are dozens of platforms to create an online course. But if you are just at the beginning of your course journey or you are not satisfied with the solution you've chosen, the most advanced platforms give you an option to move your course from one platform to another. Gurucan online course platform’ main advantage is ease of use for instructors, the ability to easily migrate from other platforms. as well as the variety of optins to interact with the audience thru different communication channels. Here are some advantages of Gurucan platform: Gurucan admin panel is simple and easy-to-understand.Manager’s tips for creating an online course leading an instuructor through all the process of online course creation.Importing and exporting of existing followers of your online course.Friendly customer support to transfer your content to the platform.Focusing on creation new features to make your courses more engaging. This way, you can develop challenges or nutrition or fitness courses easily.Here is a manual that explains more details on each of these advantages as well as tips to make your course migration to new learning management systems easier (based on migration online course to Gurucan platform): Online course on Gurucan - Some tips to make migration easy  1. Notice your existing audience If you don't want to lose your existing audience, don't make the migration process a pure surprise for them. Surprises are great, but not in this situation. People want to know in advance when some radical changes are going to happen. Write an email or send a notification to keep them updated. 2. Tell about the advantages of a new solution Of course, you want to save your audience. To do this, tell about the evident and hot advantages of a new platform. For example, tell more about your new mobile app or the challenges you're planning to do. It will interest people and they would love to try something new from you. 3. Build a strong community in advance This point is a long-term strategy that requires some time - several weeks or months. The main idea is to build a loyal community so they follow you everywhere you go. For example, you can make a discount or a free course for those who migrate with, you. Believe us, it will motivate them to try your new online course solution.
